full_summary:
Bidding for the Intrusion Detection and Access Control System Modification
____________________________________________________________________________________

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) is seeking a qualified supplier to modify the existing Intrusion Detection and Access Control System (IDACS) at the Lacombe Research and Development Centre in Lacombe, Alberta.

**Background**

The project involves integrating a new IDACS, repairing, upgrading, and/or expanding existing IDACS, including the purchase of hardware, software, and IDACS services.

**Notice and Invitation to Bid**

Only pre-qualified suppliers of Supply Arrangement # E60HN-200ACS have been invited to bid. Suppliers may qualify at any time by submitting a response to the Request for Supply Arrangement on Canada Buys.

**Mandatory Technical Criteria**

* A site visit is mandatory. Invited suppliers should refer to the solicitation documents for details.

**Contract Details**

* Expected start date: January 29, 2024
* Expected end date: March 29, 2024
* Closing date for bids: January 23, 2024 at 12:00 p.m.

**Important Notes**

* Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation.
* The debriefing may be provided in writing, by telephone, or in person.

**Contact Information**

* Desta Kissack, Contact Person
* Phone: 204 583-8127
* Email: [desta.kissack@agr.gc.ca](mailto:desta.kissack@agr.gc.ca)

**Media and Trade Agreements**

* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)

**Instructions for Bidders**

Please carefully review the solicitation documents for all bid requirements and instructions.

**Additional Information**

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) has a specific requirement to modify the existing IDACS at the Lacombe Research and Development Centre in Lacombe, Alberta. The work shall be completed on or before March 29, 2024.

Tender Evaluation Method
____________________

The lowest price shall be the determining factor for the evaluation of bids. Please be sure to follow the instructions outlined in the solicitation documents.
